body: Can someone tell me how much xp is needed for lvl 30? thank you
body_tagged: Can someone tell me how much xp is needed for lvl 30? thank you
title: Nexus Help

replies.body: I have 512xp  and am Level 12 and a half, so maybe around 1500 - 1750xp?

replies.body: You can't just multiply it like that, since it's an exponential increase.
replies.body_tagged: You can't just multiply it like that, since it's an exponential increase.

replies.body: Ask 99250, he knows everything about XP needed for certain levels.

replies.body: Avicus uses a different XP Interval/Increment (I don't know what it is) unlike Vanilla Minecrafts Interval, but Minecraft Vanilla XP levels makes 12200 XP between level 72-73. I guess Avicus did this to make the Prestige Level easy and simple to remember (level 50)
replies.body_tagged: Avicus uses a different XP Interval/Increment (I don't know what it is) unlike Vanilla Minecrafts Interval, but Minecraft Vanilla XP levels makes 12200 XP between level 72-73. I guess Avicus did this to make the Prestige Level easy and simple to remember (level 50)

replies.body: It takes 413 kills which is 825 xp
